Enjoy the full version of the game.




Resident Evil 5 - Mods to play Splitscreen and Versus Mode


Note: Steam Overlay will not work with these mods.
Enabling Mod Support

    Make sure Resident Evil 5 is installed and not running.
    In your Steam Game Library, find Resident Evil 5. Right click it and click Properties.
    Click the Local files tab.
    Click the "Browse local files..." button to open up the game folder.
    Download the fixed Launcher.exe file and save it in the game folder. Overwrite or rename the exisiting file.

Splitscreen Mod
You can only use controllers (and no keyboard) when running this mod.

    Download the Splitscreen Mod.
    Extract the files and copy them into the game folder.
    Right click on splitscreen.exe and click Properties.
    Click the Compatibility tab.
    Check the "Run this program as an administrator" checkbox.
    Click OK.
    To play the game in splitscreen, you need to run the splitscreen.exe file. You can make a shortcut by adding it as a Non-Steam game.
    When you launch the splitscreen application, there will be a prompt.
    Make sure to check the "Run the Direct X 10 version" checkbox if you use it and click OK.

    Unzip the contents of the folder to the folder XinputEmu3.0 the game, then turn XInputTest and check the settings button, the next action will be to enter into xbox360cemu file and change the setting buttons, henceforth changed files     you can add to other games that use it rains for xbox 360.

Versus Mode Mod

    Download the Versus Mod.
    Extract the files and copy them into the game folder.
    Right click on versus.exe and click Properties.
    Click the Compatibility tab.
    Check the "Run this program as an administrator" checkbox.
    Click OK.
    Open the versus.ini file.
        If you play the DirectX 9 version, change:
        "DX10=1" to "DX10=0"
        If you want to use laser sights instead of the mouse crosshair, change:
        "MouseLaser=0" to "MouseLaser=1".
    To play the game in versus mode, you need to run the versus.exe file. You can make a shortcut by adding it as a Non-Steam game.
